alert.note: Alert for Conway; Perry; Southern Pope County; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 1:55AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Perry, southwestern Conway and east central Yell Counties through 230 AM CST... At 155 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ola, or 13 miles southeast of Danville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Carden Bottoms... Petit Jean State Park... Casa... Birta... Carter Cove Park... Lakeview in Yell County... Nimrod... Fourche Junction... Pontoon... Garden Point Recreation Area... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Conway; Perry; Southern Pope County; Yell Excluding Northwest
